alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 2:01PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL CHURCHILL COUNTY THROUGH 230 PM PDT... At 201 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fallon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Junction U.S 50 And NV 117 (sheckler Cutoff), Fallon Municipal Airport, Junction U.S 50 And NV 116 (Stuart Rd), and Fallon Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
